name: electron-react-vite-template
description: A modern Electron app template with React, Vite, and TypeScript
author: Your Name <your.email@example.com>

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd renderer && npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.package: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-packager . MyApp --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite --ignore=node_modules --ignore=renderer --ignore=dist --prune=true --extra-resource=dist-frontend
scripts.package:all: npm run build && npm run package:win && npm run package:mac && npm run package:linux
scripts.setup: npm install && cd renderer && npm install
